summary: Christian's sister commits suicide. Why? After his 4 friends graduate secondary school, they head off to a Swedish cabin for midsummer as previous years. Strange things happen. Is it his sister's spirit?
cast: Kristian Leth|Laura Christensen|Tuva Novotny|Jon Lange|Nicolai Jandorf Klok|Julie R. Ølgaard|Lykke Sand|Per Oscarsson|Birgitte Simonsen|Jesper Hyldegaard|Mårten Lohti|Jim Grenander|Stefan Svensson|Louice Erlandsson
title: Midsommer
